content: The four-email drip campaign is a marketing strategy where a series of four emails are sent to a specific group of people at a pre-determined schedule. Each email in the series will focus on one of the four key dashboards offered by PTInsights: DRP Scorecard, Margin Breakdown, Preferred Vendors, and Process Overview. These emails will provide detailed information on the features, benefits, and how PTInsights can help users optimize their shop performance and profitability. Additionally, each email will drive traffic to the specific dashboard mentioned in the email. The goal of the campaign is to raise awareness of PTInsights among current and past users of PartsTrader and increase usage and recurring usage of PTInsights.
